name: neko
tagline: A self-hosted virtual browser streamed over WebRTC
description: Neko is a self-hosted virtual browser running in Docker. It streams browser sessions as video to clients over WebRTC, making it ideal for collaboration, testing, or remote browsing with shared access.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Run browsers in Docker containers and stream sessions via WebRTC to multiple users

features.title: Shared Control
features.description: Multiple users can view and control the same browser session simultaneously

features.title: Multiple Browser Support
features.description: Choose from Firefox, Chromium, or other browsers for different use cases

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Manage who can view or control sessions with user permissions and locks

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Transfer files between local machines and the virtual browser environment

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Copy and paste content between local system and remote browser session

features.title: Audio Streaming
features.description: Share browser audio with all connected users in real-time
